name: Reimbursement to counties
text: The State shall reimburse the counties for the unit cost of issuing a removable windshield placard or a temporary removable windshield placard on behalf of the State.  Beginning July 1, 2006, the rate of the per unit cost reimbursement shall be $12.  All fees collected by the counties for issuing removable and temporary removable windshield placards shall be deposited into the state general fund. [L 2006, c 269, §1; am L 2007, c 77, §1]
